statements: SELECT * FROM edge_devices
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices WHERE device_id = 123
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_reported FROM edge_devices ORDER BY last_reported DESC
SELECT device_name, longitude FROM edge_devices WHERE latitude > 30.0
SELECT AVG(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM edge_devices
SELECT * FROM edge_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC, last_reported ASC
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM edge_devices WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -75.0
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices WHERE last_reported < '2022-01-01'
SELECT device_id, last_reported FROM edge_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%sensor%'
SELECT * FROM edge_devices WHERE device_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY device_id
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM devices ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT id, name FROM devices WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM devices WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < 20;
SELECT devices.name, locations.timestamp FROM devices INNER JOIN locations ON devices.id = locations.device_id WHERE devices.id = 2;
SELECT devices.name, locations.timestamp FROM locations INNER JOIN devices ON locations.device_id = devices.id WHERE locations.latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT devices.name, locations.timestamp, locations.latitude, locations.longitude FROM devices INNER JOIN locations ON devices.id = locations.device_id WHERE locations.timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM edge_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_status WHERE status='active';
SELECT device_id, event, event_timestamp FROM device_history WHERE device_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, device_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices WHERE latitude > 30 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, longitude FROM edge_devices WHERE longitude < -100 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT status_id, device_id, status FROM device_status WHERE status = 'error' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT history_id, device_id, event FROM device_history WHERE event LIKE 'device%' ORDER BY history_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'R%' AND (latitude < 35 OR longitude > -120);
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE location_lat > 50 AND location_long < 0;
SELECT device_id, status, last_updated FROM device_status WHERE status = 'offline';
SELECT device_name, event_type, event_timestamp FROM devices JOIN device_history ON devices.id = device_history.device_id ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM device_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM devices WHERE id = 5
SELECT device_name, status, last_updated FROM devices JOIN device_status ON devices.id = device_status.device_id WHERE devices.device_type = 'laptop'
SELECT * FROM device_history WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY device_id, event_timestamp DESC
SELECT devices.device_name, device_alerts.alert_type, device_alerts.alert_message FROM devices JOIN device_alerts ON devices.id = device_alerts.device_id WHERE device_alerts.alert_type = 'critical'
SELECT * FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, status, last_updated FROM device_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM device_alerts WHERE alert_type LIKE 'Low%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, track_date, track_time, latitude, longitude FROM device_tracking WHERE device_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, status, last_updated FROM device_status WHERE status='Active';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message, timestamp FROM device_alerts WHERE alert_type='Critical' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, track_date, track_time, latitude, longitude FROM device_tracking WHERE track_date='2022-03-15';
